content: I agree; social media companies, governments and organizations should work together to promote digital literacy and support responsible online behavior. It is a collective effort to encourage individuals to use technology more responsibly and understand how to interact safely and positively online. Promoting digital literacy can help minimize the negative impact of social media, reduce cyberbullying and promote responsible information sharing. Encouraging responsible behavior and educating users about the impact of their online activity can contribute to creating a more informed, healthy, and respectful online culture.
